problem_summary_simple: Find the central node in a star graph given its edges.
problem_summary_technical: Given edges of a star graph, identify the node connected to all others by checking the first two edges.
key_insights: In a star graph, the center node must be present in every edge.
Comparing the first two edges is sufficient to find the common node.
The solution leverages the specific structure of a star graph for O(1) efficiency.
